title: No, Donald Trump Didn’t Say ‘I Can’t Breathe’ to Mock George Floyd
subtitle: Viral Video of Trump Mocking George Floyd Fact Check: A video showing Donald Trump saying “I can’t breathe” is being shared  with the claim that he is mocking Floyd. However, the video was taken when Trump was actually mocking his political rivals.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video showing US President Donald Trump saying “I can’t breathe” which were the few last words of George Floyd, is being shared on social media with the claim that he is mocking Floyd.

However, the video was taken months prior to the Floyd incident and Trump was actually mocking his political rivals Mike Bloomberg and Amy Klobuchar.
